compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

D:\\POC\\ecomm-poc\\server\\serverless.y.serviceRawFile:
service: product-service

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: "Allow"
      Action:
        - "dynamodb:Scan"
        - "dynamodb:GetItem"
      Resource: "arn:aws:dynamodb:us-east-1:*:table/product_list"

functions:
  fetchProducts:
    handler: index.handler
    timeout: 30
    memorySize: 512
    events:
      - http:
          path: api/v1/products
          method: get
          cors: true
      - http:
          path: api/v1/product/{id}
          method: get
          cors: true

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
